item.description:
Location: Chelo's in East Providence, on route 6


Had enough of politics as usual, religious fanatics, superstitions and the lack of logic in today's society? Yearning to talk with someone rational for awhile? Have a drink or two and and enjoy some food while we engage in our conversation.
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the girls in the front where the RI Skeptics Society is sitting.
item.name: Rhode Island Skeptics Society Monthly Meetup
